issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:

fields.summary: nodeadmin-unpack-instance fails with ceph_user_name error in non ceph environment

comments.body: Updated the failure handling to accommodate scenarios where those values are not present in the eucalyptus.conf

Verified.  I no longer get this error.
{code}
[root@g-08-11 ~]# rpm -qi eucalyptus-nc
Name        : eucalyptus-nc
Version     : 4.3.0
Release     : 0.25010.343.20160628gitcb817f6.el7
Architecture: x86_64
Install Date: Tue 28 Jun 2016 11:09:11 PM PDT
Group       : Applications/System
Size        : 3879119
License     : GPLv3
{code}
